title: Elemental Adept
content:
Elemental Adept Your spells ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. When you cast spells of that type, you cannot roll a 1.

Your spells ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. When you cast spells of that type, you cannot roll a 1.

Elemental Adept is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat. (Note this feat is not available in EA and all info is subject to change.)

Elemental Adept Information

Your spells ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. When you cast spells of that type, you cannot roll a 1. Select 1 Feat Passive: Elemental Adept: Acid Elemental Adept: Cold Elemental Adept: Fire Elemental Adept: Lightning Elemental Adept: Thunder

Elemental Adept: Acid Elemental Adept: Cold Elemental Adept: Fire Elemental Adept: Lightning Elemental Adept: Thunder

How to unlock Elemental Adept

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Elemental Adept

All Classes at Level 4

Elemental Adept Tips & Notes

Allows you to bypass resistance on an enemy when using a specific damage type. There are a couple of subclasses in this game that are specific to damage types, like Light Clerics are very fire-oriented and Storm Sorcerers are very Thunder-oriented. Notes & Tips go here
